sources.title: The Son-of-a-gun (1919)
sources.description: Gilbert M. Anderson plays a cowboy who gets kicked out of town and told he'll be shot if he comes back. A Thunderbird Picture.

metadata.Plot: After Bill, a wild man known as the Son-of-a-Gun, disrupts May's party, he is kicked out of town and told he will be shot if he returns. In the next County he finds May's young brother being cheated at poker. Recovering the money the boy lost, he brings him home.
metadata.Director: Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson, Jess Robbins
metadata.Writer: Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson, Jess Robbins
metadata.Actors: Gilbert M. 'Broncho Billy' Anderson, Joy Lewis, Fred Church
